TopicTitle: OMSK Space Products - Stockalike Atlas rockets & more! [Omich-L Beta]

Articles.Content:
> 
> It has a 1.875-2.5m service module. The Titan rockets are all about 3m in diameter, which scales to 2.5m...

No it scales to 1.875 m

> 
> No it scales to 1.875 m

I know. But for ease of ingame sizes, it's better to keep it 2.5m. It's too hard to stick 2 Kerbals into a 1.25m pod in the shape of Gemini, plus they need their helmets (for EVAs). Otherwise, the sizing doesn't bother me very much. However, if you can find a post of Beale stating that he's going to resize the Gemini like you said, I'd be very curious to see. Honestly, I'd rather see the Atlas here rescaled to be 1.875m.
Cant wait to see Titan. Will it have the ability to be Titan III as well?
Do I have an old version or is there an issue with the Atlas engine fairing? Is there a fix or am I just using the wrong version?
There is no issue with the Atlas engine fairing. The order is put the sustainer engine on first, than the fairing, than the boosters.

Delta II?

I know. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(") It's only going to get worse. The issue is that it would be a \*lot\* of work to split it up into packs and maintain them separately. If anything, I'm more daunted by that prospect than I am for doing Saturn.

> 

If anything, OMSK would fit great in BDB. Any way you could adopt or integrate? You'd be the perfect candidate. BDB is overwhelming, and because there's just ***so much*** in it, I usually don't install it unless I want something specific out of it. I think in general, chopping BDB into more bite-size pieces would help. I'd love to just be able to easily install specific sets of parts rather than the entirety. I can't possibly use the entire pack, and so much of it just ends up being clutter. A OMSK pack for all the Atlas stuff would be a good pack on it's own.

OMSK, I just think BDB is MUCH better.

I still use OMSK as a source for redstone and early-end Atlas parts for my NASA career-mode mod.  

I tried out using one or two alternative packs (such as BDB) for these two launchers, but they were too "heavy" and I ended up having to remove so many parts that it felt like a waste to have them as dependencies. I'd love to adopt the redstone and atlas parts if snowwhite ever decided to "officially" abandon the mod and allow it.
